title: On some metric properties of supertoken graphs
authors: E. T. Baskoro, C. Dalf\'o, M. A. Fiol, R. Simanjuntak
abstract:
In this paper, we construct two infinite families of graphs $G(d,c)$ and
$G^+(d,c)$, where, in both cases, a vertex label is $x_1x_2\ldots x_c$ with
$x_i\in\{1,2,\ldots, d\}$. We provide a lower bound on the metric dimension,
tight on $G^+(d,c)$. Moreover, we give the definition and properties of the
supertoken graphs, a generalization of the well-known token graphs. Finally, we
provide an upper bound on the metric dimension of supertoken graphs.
